raw_header: ----- Forwarded by Tana Jones/HOU/ECT on 05/08/2000 03:51 PM -----

blocks.subject: Memo to Brazilian Counsel
text: Attached is the memorandum we sent to Brazilian counsel in 1996 which
addressed both, the physical and financial trading, I hope this helps.  Let
me know if you need anything else.
